item.title: The lampost light on PARK AVENUE At the STAIRS to the alleyway (hence the importance) THIS LAMP IS NOT WORKING., 9th December
item.description:
Since this lampost light illuminates the stairs to the alleyway(alleyway leads to the Close), the 4 way junction of park avenue and kinnaird avenue and the school warning signage this lampost lamp needs to be working - it is pretty vital. There have been many accidents on this junction. In our view this is an emergency but when I rang the emergency number there was no answer. Thank you. Marianne Mihaly number 10 Kinnaird close Please call me if necessary 07966 040933
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Park Avenue, Plaistow, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pavement Damage Caused by Concrete Truck – Burrell St, 9 Dec 2025, 9th December
item.description:
I would like to report damage to the pavement and kerb on the north side of Burrell Street, between Blackfriars Road and Chancel Street. Details: • Date & Time: 9 December 2025, around 13:50 • Location: North side of Burrell Street, between Blackfriars Road and Chancel Street • Vehicle Involved: Concrete truck, license plate ET67 YPA • Company: McPhee • Description: The truck mounted the curb and caused damage to part of the pavement and kerb, likely due to its weight. Thank you for your attention to this matter.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 15, Burrell Street, Southwark, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
